Text: RE Red Rock Transwestern Cashflow Cc Palu Two major items affected the cashflow since August Air permits have been delayed from August to November The delay of the air permits impacts construction start dates and delays shipment of material Major payments of material equipment and construction have slipped into because of the air permit delays Our compressor vendor has had a few problems Their payments are tied to progress Our current forecast represents their current payment schedule which has slipped as their fabrication has been delayed Thanks Steve Kalmus Original Message From Goradia Pallavi Sent Tuesday November PM To Kalmus Steve Cc Kleb Steve Eisenstein Arnold L Hubbard Dave Jones Vera Geaccone Tracy Moore Jan Subject RE Red Rock Transwestern Cashflow Importance High Steve The last forecast you sent the Red Rock cash flow was million the current forecast is million Please explain the difference of million This affects the TW Maketing Capital Plan for ThanksPalu Goradia ETS OSSFinancial Planning Original Message From Kalmus Steve Sent Friday November PM To Kleb Steve Goradia Pallavi Eisenstein Arnold L Hubbard Dave Jones Vera Subject Red Rock Transwestern Cashflow Here is the Red Rock cashflow File Red Rock Cashflow thru Octoberxls Steve Kalmus
